instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01814: What is 820-01814? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1990: What is A1990? A1990 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2018, 2019 with EMC3215, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01041, 820-01814..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A 20v0.05a no power.
threads.message:
I have another <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1990</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> pulling . 20v 0.0a going up to 0.08 0.056 0.079 0.089 then 1.03 then back to 0.80 then 0.00a.
Non of the ssd voltages is available
They are all reading milli voltages
<SIGNAL>2V5_NAND_SSD0</SIGNAL> is shorted to Ground
I cleared the shot.. but is not still coming up. With battery it’s drawing up to 3.15a
But without battery it’s drawing. 0.00,.0.05,0.07 back to 0.00
Pls what can I do
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Is present stable 12.9
All ssd voltages are available now.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A 20v0.05a no power.
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01814</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A 20v0.05a no power.
threads.message:
yes. In dfu mode. So 
I was able to restore it with configurator2. And it’s fine now. Thanks
